item.title: Comment on AI-generated poetry is indistinguishable from human-written poetry and is rated more favorably by sheep falling
item.description:
There once was an AI from cyberspace
That wrote poems better than poets can
It was especially good
As you might expect
At writing limericks that actually rhyme

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/ai-generated-poetry-is-indistinguishable-from-human-written-poetry-and-is-rated-more-favorably.html?commentID=160835796

item.title: Comment on How to make DOGE work by Martinned
item.description:
It is fascinating how so many Trump voters and Musk worshippers continue to rationalise their foolishness by trying to convince themselves that Trump and Musk are things they are not. Neither one is remotely interested in sound government policy. It’s crony capitalism all the way down.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/how-to-make-doge-work.html?commentID=160835773

item.title: Comment on How to make DOGE work by Jimenez
item.description:
Had a good laugh at the idea of loosening vaccine-approval regulations. Let’s see what the new Health and Human Services Secretary makes of that proposal shall we.

item.title: Comment on How to make DOGE work by Etalon d'Silomar
item.description:
DOGE will become the route for companies to get exemptions from regulation. This is a perfect way to reward political allies.
